author: secondlayer
title: [CRUST] Cardano Node in Rust
description: Only one implementation of Ouroboros is available for Cardano, currently in Haskell; limiting ideas exploration and ecosystem resilience...
solution: Implement required libraries and bind them together to build Shelley compatible Cardano Node...
experience: The proposing team has implemented Cardano Ouroboros Networking crate in Rust, and possibilities for partnership with former IOG devs exist.
